entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Alex speaking. How can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I recently received a VeloFit bike, and I'm not happy with the condition it arrived in. I think there was some significant shipping damage.
I'm sorry to hear that you received a damaged VeloFit bike. Can you tell me more about what happened?
Well, when I unboxed it, I immediately noticed the frame. It has a cracked frame near the seat post. Also, the front wheel is completely wobbly. It's unusable.
Oh no, that sounds terrible! I understand your frustration. A cracked frame and wobbly wheel are certainly not what you expect. I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.
Yeah, I was really looking forward to using it.
Absolutely. Let's get this resolved for you right away. To make things right, I'm going to issue you a full refund for the bike. And of course, we'll arrange for its return at no cost to you.

Yes, absolutely. I'll email you a free label that you can print out and attach to the box. You can then schedule a pickup with the carrier or drop it off at your convenience. Once we receive the returned bike and confirm the shipping damage, the refund will be processed immediately.
Okay, that sounds perfect. So just to confirm, I get a full refund and a free label to return the bike?
Exactly! You'll receive a full refund and we'll provide a free label for the return. No cost to you at all.
Wonderful, thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.
You're very welcome! I'm glad we could resolve this for you. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again!
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
